member.name: P:System.SR.ArgsCantBeNull
member.summary: Arguments within the 'args' array passed to Start cannot be null.

member.name: P:System.SR.InvalidEnumArgument
member.summary: The value of argument '{0}' ({1}) is invalid for Enum type '{2}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.NoService
member.summary: Service '{0}' was not found on computer '{1}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.OpenSC
member.summary: Cannot open Service Control Manager on computer '{0}'. This operation might require other privileges.

member.name: P:System.SR.Timeout
member.summary: The operation requested for service '{0}' has not been completed within the specified time interval.

member.name: P:System.SR.PlatformNotSupported_ServiceController
member.summary: ServiceController enables manipulating and accessing Windows services and it is not applicable for other operating systems.

member.name: P:System.SR.CannotChangeProperties
member.summary: Cannot change CanStop, CanPauseAndContinue, CanShutdown, CanHandlePowerEvent, or CanHandleSessionChangeEvent property values after the service has been started.

member.name: P:System.SR.CannotChangeName
member.summary: Cannot change service name when the service is running.

member.name: P:System.SR.ServiceName
member.summary: Service name '{0}' contains invalid characters, is empty, or is too long (max length = {1}).

member.name: P:System.SR.NoServices
member.summary: Service has not been supplied. At least one object derived from ServiceBase is required in order to run.

member.name: P:System.SR.CantStartFromCommandLine
member.summary: Cannot start service from the command line or a debugger. A Windows Service must first be installed and then started with the ServerExplorer, Windows Services Administrative tool or the NET START command.

member.name: P:System.SR.NotInPendingState
member.summary: UpdatePendingStatus can only be called during the handling of Start, Stop, Pause and Continue commands.

member.name: P:System.SR.ShutdownOK
member.summary: Service has been successfully shut down.

member.name: P:System.SR.ShutdownFailed
member.summary: Failed to shut down service. The error that occurred was: {0}.

member.name: P:System.SR.PowerEventOK
member.summary: PowerEvent handled successfully by the service.

member.name: P:System.SR.PowerEventFailed
member.summary: Failed in handling the PowerEvent. The error that occurred was: {0}.
